Question
========

On a given exam, the mean grade equals 7.0 with a variance equal to 1.21. Someone with a grade of 8.5 then has a z-score equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 1.04
* 1.24
* 1.36

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.04: Incorrect
* 1.24: Incorrect
* 1.36: Correct
